bug.short_desc: Using the remote table model and Xhr

long_desc.thetext:
In Qooxdoo 2.1 Manual, precisely at 7.5 Specific Widget Communication, 7.5.1 Using the remote table model, show us how to use Remote Table Model using qx.io.remote.Request. Well, in the API VIEWER, is advised the following:
Note: This class will be deprecated in a future release. Instead, please use classes found in qx.io.request.
There is, aparently, no tutorial showing a sample of how to use qx.io.request to do the job. I see a confusion regarding that.
Even in "component" box of the "File a Bug" on Qooxdoo Bugzilla, there is no component as "qx.io.request". All this may confuse another fellows.
